name: Attack on Titan: Reborn
description:
AoT:Reborn is a fork of Guedin's AoT but in many ways improved. Play as of right now with Eren or Levi and defeat a wave of Titans. Master the 3DMG and your chosen character to achieve the best time and score possible!

As of version 0.3 there is now alpha version of multiplayer available! Join the discord server for more information and to find people who play.

https://discord.gg/hjZTVDW5Ja

Gameplay and updates + more on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCKorpQ3dgZmQPh88kcG8eOg

Thanks to Hajime Isayama for the story and the universe. And thanks to Hiroyuki Sawano for the great OST.

#fangame #multiplayer #action #AoT #AttackOnTitan
